name: SouthShoreBank
0:
”Alexa open south shore bank”
”Alexa ask south shore bank for balance”
”Alexa ask south shore bank for transactions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: south shore bank
des:
Stay on top of your finances with the South Shore Bank skill. Ask Alexa for balances and recent transactions.

Once you've enabled the skill, you can ask questions such as:
 - "What's my checking account balance?"
 - "What are my recent transactions?"
 - "What are my account balances?"

Use of this skill will allow your financial information to be read aloud or displayed visually.
